original_text: Then one of the cherubim reached out his hand to the fire that was among them. He took up some of it and put it into the hands of the man in linen, who took it and went out.
korean_text: 그 그룹이 그룹들 사이에서 손을 내밀어 그 그룹들 사이에 있는 불을 집어 가는 베 옷을 입은 자의 손에 주매 그가 받아 가지고 나가는데

sentences.original_text: Then one of the cherubim reached out his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그룹 중 하나가 그의 손을 뻗었고

sentences.original_text: to the fire that was among them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 사이에 있던 불에 손을 뻗었고

sentences.original_text: He took up some of it
and put it into the hands of the man in linen
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 아마 입은 사람의 손에 넣었으니

sentences.original_text: who took it and went out
